items.name: Bikini Beach - To Flaunt That Bod
items.section_title: Bikini Beach - To Flaunt That Bod
items.section_excerpt: Situated on Rasdhoo Island, this is officially Maldives's bikini beach where you can flaunt your beach body without any worries. The beach not only offers breathtaking views, but is also huge in size. Leafy palm trees and comfy sun beds environs the beach quite well. So cuddle up with your love, soak up some sun and enjoy your romantic getaway at one of the most private beaches of Maldives!

items.name: Reethi Beach - An Epitome Of Luxury
items.section_title: Reethi Beach - An Epitome Of Luxury
items.section_excerpt: Located on a tiny island in the Baa Atoll, Reethi Beach is an epitome of luxury and the most beautiful beach in Maldives. The white sands, sparkling water, and the beautiful palm trees make it the best beach in Maldives for honeymoon. With idyllic water villas to numerous fancy restaurants, Reethi Beach surely possesses the power of adding world-class comfort to your holiday. If you want to visit …
items.description: Located on a tiny island in the Baa Atoll, Reethi Beach is an epitome of luxury and the most beautiful beach in Maldives. The white sands, sparkling water, and the beautiful palm trees make it the best beach in Maldives for honeymoon. With idyllic water villas to numerous fancy restaurants, Reethi Beach surely possesses the power of adding world-class comfort to your holiday. If you want to visit Maldives beaches at night, then this is the place to be owing to the lit nightlife here.
query_hints: Reethi Beach - An Epitome Of Luxury
Reethi Beach - An Epitome Of Luxury Maldives

items.name: Mirihi Island Beach - That Lavish Resort
items.section_title: Mirihi Island Beach - That Lavish Resort
items.section_excerpt: Palm trees, white sand, emerald water, and comfortable seabeds, this beach has got everything you need to satisfy the nature admirer in you. Located on a small private island in South Ari Atoll, the beach is set amidst luxurious resorts that will surely sweep you off your feet the moment you step here.

items.name: Milaidhoo Island Maldives
items.section_title: Milaidhoo Island Maldives
items.section_excerpt: Among all the Maldives best beaches this one is considered as the most popular one. People who are inclined to enjoying luxury in a natural environment, then this Island will be the best option to visit. Surrounded by powdery white sands beside a coral reef, this Island is perfect for the guests who are going to experience an indulgent escape from their daily mundane work life.

items.name: Angsana Ihuru
items.section_title: Angsana Ihuru
items.section_excerpt: This place is an eco-friendly luxury resort situated on the Island with the famous house reef in the Maldives. There is one best house reef located in the Maldives, located a few meters away from the beach. The arrangements for spectacular snorkeling and the excellent diving arrangements insist people to explore the underwater wonders. Apart from this drinks and delicious food are served in the re…
items.description: This place is an eco-friendly luxury resort situated on the Island with the famous house reef in the Maldives. There is one best house reef located in the Maldives, located a few meters away from the beach. The arrangements for spectacular snorkeling and the excellent diving arrangements insist people to explore the underwater wonders. Apart from this drinks and delicious food are served in the restaurant situated in the beach and excellent Thai spa sessions are offered to the guests visiting there.
query_hints: Angsana Ihuru
Angsana Ihuru Maldives
